reviews_data.review_text: Very bitter, super loud, hot, and cramped inside ‚Ä¶. üëéüèº
always so busy. the queen bee is my favorite‚Äî tastes kinda like pancake batter if you're into that

Brakeman's Coffee & Supply is centrally located at 225 N. Trade Street in downtown Matthews. it's the perfect breakfast spot to stop by on your way to work or meet friends during the day for a quick latte. It's one of the many gems that Matthews has to offer.
We love Brakeman's! Great coffee, muffins and atmosphere! Staff is so friendly. It's one of our favorite places!
Only visit this coffee shop twice so far but it's always quick and friendly service. Their iced vanilla latte is delicious! The vibe is really relaxed and their bakery items look delicious.
The Candied Almond and Gingerbread seasonals are Amazing!

nice warm and cozy place, extremely friendly staff, and very relaxing ambience. I waited 3 weeks to come here and it was well worth it, I will definitely miss this place when my holiday leave ends and I return to my duty station.
Very friendly staff always good drinks and food with a very calming and chill atmosphere
Nice little tiny spot to grab a cup of coffee with friends. Not too crowded, friendly staff
Nice hometown establishment, comforting vibes! Used to come here all the time in HS and upon revisiting have lots of nice memories here.
This caf√© is amazing, I loved how they made this place so different to others, my coffee was delicious, it was calm enough to make some calls and finish my work. I really recommend this place.
Nice spot with great coffee. Perfect for meeting some friends or getting some work done! Plenty of plugs to keep your devices charged üòä

I love the pastries that they offer, they taste homemade üòÄ. I love the healthier option of strawberry smoothie with yogurt and of course the coffee ‚òïÔ∏è is yummy. I found that i like iced coffee too!! Great meeting place and beautiful outside courtyard garden in the back.

Great atmosphere and coffee/tea/other drinks at a decent price. Its only downside is that it tends to get so busy on Saturday mornings that the line stretches out the door and it takes forever to get to the front, but in order to attract so many customers they must be doing something right, so it's a good problem to have.
The go to post farmer's market coffee spot!

Ian, Scott, Tyler, and Wilson are the best workers there. Absolutely deserve a raise, they always make the best coffees, hand out the best looking pastries and knows how to help you out with what you want to order. They give out the best recommendations and my husband will never drink coffee from any other place but this one. Super nice and friendly people, from customers to friends :) üíïüíïüíïüíïüíï

I usually get Iced Vanila Latte and Great Pumpkin Latte(seasonal menu) with Oatmilk. Today, I got the Iced Slow-Berry Matcha Latte with Oatmilk. WOW! It's fresh and tasty :) The Berry flavor and Matcha tea taste go well together and the Berry flavor is not too strong, so it does not lose the Matcha tea taste. And I highly recommend Great Pumpkin Latte for everyone who likes Pumpkin  :)
A beautiful little shop with lots of amenities! A great atmosphere! However, the coffee itself was very sweet and cheaply made. The bathroom was dirty and had a roach in it.
Love this old historical coffee shop! They do make delicious coffee,  especially the seasonal options are good! Loved the front  with big windows and the cutest romantic patio in the back ‚ù§Ô∏è
Enjoyed an iced latte here. Nice environment & atmosphere. Great area to sit outside.
Great little coffee shop very busy Saturday morning. Good staff

I have been visiting Brakeman's for the better part of 4 years and it has been my favorite local coffee shop to meet with friends, do homework, and relax. It has even helped to influence the style of coffee shop I hope to one day open! I always recommend it to all of my friends and love their punch-card rewards system! Keep up the great work!
Great coffee selection and lots of indoor and outdoor seating.

Pretty average. Not sure how you mess up a chai latte, but they're consistently meh. Espresso drinks are highly dependent on the barista. Usually the ratio to milk is way off or the espresso is burnt. Popular because there's no other option in Matthews, not because the product is great.
Nice ambience.
Delicious iced latte and lovely outdoor patio!
Nice staff friendly atmosphere
The building is so quaint and the coffee is delicious.
I got my Decaf coffee beans from here, I like it, fresh, and reach of flavor.. Highly recommend place to get your coffee beans in charlotte area
Just a great place to get coffee and get a nice bite to eat.

Excellent batch brew coffee (Colombian roasted by Haerfest). Good espresso shot. Friendly baristas. Great coffee shop with character and unique nooks for seating inside. Lots of outdoor seating options
Great local coffeehouse. Wonderful to space inside or outside to relax or work remote. Important to support local business!
About 8 parking spots in total and adjacent buildings will tow. If it wasn't such a hassle to find the entrance and then realize there's no parking I might have given this place a go.
Cool place, great menu. Friendly staff and yummy products
Differentiated menu and high quality coffee. Service is quick and cheerful
Plenty of little places to sit. Good coffee and friendly baristas. Busy but not over crowded.
The seating inside is crowded, but it's set up nicely. The outside is beautiful and comfortable.  The coffee is great. Espresso is very good.
The best coffee in Matthews and the best service
Best coffee house in Matthews! Absolutely love this place it's a great place, got great muffins and other assortments, but has the best coffee in town.

Had a lovely time at this little cafe. Wonderful seating for reading or working on a laptop. The staff was exceptionally friendly and my order didn't take too long to come out. The coffee was also super delicious, and they have some pretty interesting pastry options.
Good coffee ‚òï & great service
great environment
Damn good cup of coffee ‚òï.

Most unique and relaxing coffee shop in CLT area. Always slinging great lattes and cortados in a very warm and inviting atmosphere. Great staff. Locally roasted beans. Neat seasonal menu. Busy on Saturday's when the farmers market is open, but you can not beat a Saturday stroll in Matthews through the farmers market and Brakemans and then doing lunch in one of the great spots in walking distance. Slow down and enjoy the ride! #slowdown

We are new in town and had a great experience, we were having our coffee in their outdoor seating area and the owner (who was gardening around the cafe) came and said hi and asked us about our experience there. The coffee is great! The coffee is locally roasted, and you can tell that this is a business that loves the community and that the community loves it!
Excellent Americano and friendly service marked this visit to this quaint cafe.  The atmosphere is cozy and inviting and the vibe is peaceful!
Very delicious coffee! Ice vanilla latte, shadey seats on the patio, nice all around. On Saturday morning, line and ordering took 27 minutes. Popular place!
(Translated by Google) Love this place ‚ù§Ô∏è  (Original) –õ—é–±–ª—é —ç—Ç–æ –º–µ—Å—Ç–æ ‚ù§Ô∏è
Good coffee, and a few non caffeinated herbals in a cute house right in downtown Matthews. Love the back gardens for the privacy and the front garden for the town center feel.
Delicious coffee, and a fun, relaxing atmosphere.

I love the story behind Brakeman's, to slow life down like the brakeman on the train. There is a shady patio out back, inside tables and out front seating to enjoy Downtown Matthews. They have a large drink selection and delicious treats. My favorites are the Ticket Please (Expresso milkshake) and the Matcha latte.
Such a nice coffee shop in Matthews. It had it all. Great service, great coffee, nice outdoor seating, and great baked goods. I had the coffee cake. All in all a great experience. Recommend.
Great spot for work meetings and just to hangout
What a beautiful place to grab some dang good coffee. Inside and outside areas are wonderful places to sit back, relax, and imbibe.
Very friendly staff, great location, great coffee.
Honey bee latte with oat milk slaps every time. This is a genuinely enjoyable coffee stop. ‚ù§Ô∏è

Stopped by looking for a spot to read after visiting the library. This place is obviously a local favorite because the place was busy all morning I was there. They have a great spread of drinks to choose from and extend past the typical coffee shop offerings.  I ordered the Queen Bee latte which was the perfect pairing for reading outside on a warm day.  Also, they had a wonderful assortment of birds hanging around the front patio.
Pleasant.
Great meeting spot. Good coffee.
Best place for coffee and conversation.  Matthews staple for a reason!
This is a gem of a coffee shop. Atmosphere is awesome. Chai is delicious. Smoothies are great. Happy to have found this place.
Love the Reuben. Really nice staff. Comfortable indoors.

Brakeman's is essentially the face of Mathews. I love this spot, the staff, the owners, and of course the coffee. They do a great job with their bean selection and make fantastic drinks from their drip to their seasonal menu. The charming old house gives the perfect coffee shop vibes. If you can find a spot to sit it's a comfortable place to work or hang out. The outside seating and back patio is beautiful. Muffins and snacks are the food options and all drinks are to-go style.
Cute place, friendly staff and decent coffee

Brakeman's is one of many jewels in downtown Matthews. I love the decor, drinks, and ample space (indoor, sun room, and out). Reasonable amount of parking on the street out front or in the lot behind them. Perfect place for a small work meeting or just to take a little break. It can get a bit crowded.
Easy food, sweet and coffee, All Times
My favorite local coffee place. There's a reason they're always packed on the weekends. This place is amazing! I love checking in every now and then to see their new seasonal flavors
Coffee tasted burnt. I threw it away after one sip. Really had high hopes.
Such a great coffee shop. Love the coffee hear and it's a great space to have a work meeting.
Super cute with delicious coffee

Have tried the coffee here a few times but always got it to go with me ! The coffee is really delicious , they have a lot of options took . The people that work here are very attentive and polite . I love the ambience of this place and looking forward to stay and have some delicious coffee !
Brakeman's cozy atmosphere, friendly staff, good selection, and great coffee are what keep me coming back!
Fantastic Chai tea, customer service was outstanding. Great ambiance, friendly welcome. Thank you.
Best Americana I have ever had.
Delicious coffee!! Also such a cute cafe, I'd love to visit again but maybe when it's less crowded. The outdoor area is perfect for warm, sunny weather.
Love this place. One of my favourite places in Charlotte.

I saw a friend post about their seasonal Cookie Butter Chai and drove here to get one two days later. I actually had a gift card too so it was the perfect opportunity to use it.  They were super friendly and when we had 29 cents left after our gift card, they just said not to worry about it. Our drinks were ready quickly and were the perfect temperature to drink right away‚Äîvery warm, but not burn your tongue hot.  There was a perfectly delicious hint of cookie butter and the chai was delicious. It wasn't the overly sweet stuff you find at a lot of places. You'll find a spicy, flavorful chai here.  I'll definitely stop by again sometime!
Good coffee

I called to place order for coffee beans, and mugs and gift cards. I found staff was rude, nonhelpful when I asked to speak to manager or owner was told to email if I wanted them. very poor customer service.

Amazing coffee. Amazing service. Amazing location. Amazing atmosphere.  ----- Update 01/2022:  Back patio has two propane heaters to help cut through cold days to enjoy a cuppa with a friend, while not having to be indoors. Thank you Brakeman's management and staff! Y'all rock! ‚òïüî•‚ò∫Ô∏è  ----- Update 09/2021:  The Apple Chai-der is autumn in a cup! Amazing! The Rosemary Brown Sugar Latte (w/ oat milk) is amazing as well. Definitely a place to enjoy creative flavors... especially in the fall.
Tasty coffee, friendly staff, and a great atmosphere. Highly recommend!

Brakeman's consistently provides a great experience!! I work in EMS so I go all over Mecklenburg County, and this is one of my favorite coffee shops around. Today, while in my uniform, I ordered a latte. Ian Lawrence took my order and was so friendly and engaging. He even thanked me for my public service which made my day. The coffee shop was quite busy, but I only had to wait a few minutes for my drink. I received my latte, made by Scott, and it was delicious. He was friendly as well. The customer service here is outstanding, and the employees should be commended for doing a great job.
So good!!!
Great coffee, fun atmosphere, the entire store is well lit & they have plenty of seating! A must see for coffee snobs for sure!
The snickerdoodle latte was delightful!
Had a lavender latte and an almond poppyseed muffin. Everything was off-the-charts good. Good coffee and food, great atmosphere. I'd give it seven stars if I could.
Nice location.  Friendly service.  Great coffee and chai tea.  Like the outdoor seating.
Good place and coffee
Great coffee ever
Good coffee with outdoor seating. The go-to place for your coffee needs.
Love Brakemans! My wife and I stop by frequently for a coffee and sometimes to read a book. Great coffee and awesome staff. Always makes for a great afternoon!
Great community vibe and genuine staff. If you're in Matthews, this is the only place you should ever go for coffee!

Absolutely a great coffee shop because of the location. The coffee was good but it was a quaint location in downtown Matthew's. Indoor and Outdoor seating plus WIFI. Parking was limited, but the greenway has plenty of spots with the stair case leading directly up to the shop.
Was a really nice little place. The staff was super nice and helped with my decision here. Glad they had some vegan options for everyone to enjoy!
Delicious!!! Got my go-to drink, hot cafe mocha. Perfect!
Line is always long and so, the workers are overwhelmed and your drinks won't come as good. Got a chai tea latte here and it just straight up taste like whole milk.
My favorite cafe! And they got a community printer!
LoFi Study beats, chill baristas, great location... and even better coffee. What else do you need?
My girlfriend got the hibiscus tea and absolutely loved it

I always choose to work at Brakeman's when I lose power or internet at home and I make frequent weekend stops because I'd rather support a small business instead of one of the big coffee chains. The atmosphere is great, the staff is awesome, and the prices are surprisingly decent. However, almost every coffee that I've ordered, hot or cold, has had almost no taste to it whatsoever. I do not put much dairy in my coffee to begin with, but I always ask them to go light because of this, and even then my drinks still barely taste like coffee. If they can figure out how to make some stronger coffee and/or fix the coffee-to-milk ratio, I'll gladly bump this up to 5 stars.
Love Brakemans! I am a student and I come here all the time to study. Great atmosphere and awesome coffee. Look no further for a local coffee shop!
Funky coffee spot, great service and excellent coffee drinks.
My favorite place to order a lavender latte... If you haven't tried it I am sure you are missing a lot
Preaty good coffee a tad bitter for my taste but best in area
Awesome !
Great üëç

This was such a cute little coffee shop! I got an iced oat milk lavender latte and sat outside enjoying the day. I definitely think the outside aesthetic of the house doesn't really match the inside, which was kind of a bummer, but the drinks were good and the atmosphere was enjoyable.
I love coming here on Mondays and the ladies that have served me (usually and hour before closing) have been nothing but nice and patient with me.
We're lucky to have such a great coffee shop nearby!
great friendly service!

Excellent coffee and staff is friendly even helping me to decide which yummy coffee drink to choose.  It is an adorable place and perfect for meeting a friend or like me reading a book  enjoying Brakeman's great atmosphere and subpurb coffee.  Peaceful. Highly recommend this place.  Come by and enjoy coffee, a pastry and good company.   Great place!
Coffee üëçüèª
Through and through my favorite coffee shop! The coffee and matcha is so good and the atmosphere and environment is the best! Highly recommend!!
Can be challenging to find seating but the folks who work there are great and the specialty drinks are hard to beat.
Very good prices and delicious smoothies! Definitely going back.
Super vibey coffee shop and my caramel latte was perfect! Would definitely spend a lot of time here!
Great atmosphere with lots of unique little seating areas both inside and out... Had an Americano with a splash of coconut milk and it was great... Can't wait to come back and try more!
I was happy
Great coffee and lovely atmosphere in downtown Matthews.
Great coffee and a nice atmosphere. It's usually a busy shop so parking can be tough.
Fantastic coffee and great service in a lovely atmosphere
They have an outdoor space for those of us who are not quite ready to sit inside. The coffee and service are great. I love the season NillaBerry Latte!
Great coffee, nice patio
Great coffee, wonderful staff but they do not enforce the mask mandate which makes me a little uncomfortable.
Great place..Great customer service & fast. Lovely environment.
Lovely visit, excellent coffee, and a great ambiance.
Love the vibe of this place. You can sit inside or outside. I love coming to this coffee shop to read or write. Great for families. Only a short walk from the Farmer's Market on the weekends.
Fantastic coffee shop, great employees, wonderful experiences
Best coffee shop in the entire world!
This is a really great coffee shop.  Highly recommended
Great coffee!
Best coffee in Matthews.
Friendly service. Coffee was delicious....I'd go back and try another üôÇ
Great patio for people watching. Coffee and food are good. It's on my rotation for remote work locations.
Coffee was good and the staff was very friendly.   Great little place for some life's blood.
My daughter's fav

Three stars because the atmosphere is wonderful, I truly enjoy my time there and the staff are very kind. It's an awesome place to work and meet friends! However, the coffee is consistently under par. I think it's a combination of the quality of the beans, possibly the grounds not fresh, the beans being burnt resulting in a "burnt coffee" taste, and simply unexperienced baristas. But I keep going back.

Three stars because the atmosphere is wonderful, I truly enjoy my time there and the staff are kind. However, the coffee is consistently under par. I think it's a combination of the quality of the beans, using grounds that are not fresh, the beans being burnt resulting in a "burnt coffee" taste, and unexperienced baristas.
Cozy place, friendly service

Inviting, homey atmosphere with excellent coffee! Stopped briefly while checking out Real Estate in the area, as my family and I transition away from Oregonian culture. The menu was a smaller focused approach but they still offer appropriate choices for the anti-Starbucks crowd, such as myself.  Asked for a basic peppermint mocha, and received a drink, which has the perfect blend of subtle restrained sweetness... Just right üòé‚òï
My favorite cooler shop in this area . And the stuff is very nice !

Amazing bright scent -a- licios is what I called this place. this awesome coffee house in the middle of Matthews is the go to spot for your Java fix!!! Friendly customer service, awesome selection of pastries and beverages!! Plenty of outdoor seating and parking on the street. if you don't go here then I don't know what you doing with your life
Best cappuccino in Matthews downtown
Lots cofee
smoothie are good .great place they have there
Phenomenal coffee and sweets !

An absolute gem of a coffee shop. Great seasonal and speciality beverage selection, excellent customer service, and a wonderful laid back atmosphere with plenty of different seating options. Best coffee shop I've found in the Charlotte area so far!

What a fantastic new coffee shop. Needed badly in the little uptown strip in Matthews. The lavender coffee is amazing and my favorite. Not only is this little coffee shop a great local hangout spot but this coffee shop has become a meeting place for all sorts of events. Local city officials and politicians use this as a meet and greet place to discuss local issues and policy. Always worth a stop in when walking through uptown matthews.
Floyd & Blackies in Cramerton NC is much better.
Good coffee and a very good venue.  Enjoyed it!

Nice little seasonal latte selection. I had the almond and cardamom. Even though it was really busy, the baristas were patient, pleasant and efficient. Several comfortable seating areas were available, including a large and inviting outdoor patio. Local art adorns the walls. Next time I need caffeine while I'm in Matthews, I'll be sure to visit Brakeman's again.
Always consistent, always kind, always tasty! What more could you want when looking for a cup of joe? My pleasure to support such a fantastic local business!
Coffee was delicious. Staff was very friendly and the atmosphere was wonderful. Highly recommended!
Great local spot! Great latte and baked goods!
Great coffee with a great patio
Busy, but not slow service. Friendly people. Great coffee and pastries!
Great coffee  and espresso  drinks.  Excellent and fast service.
Great americano and choc chip muffin
Awesome place to catch up with friends
Enjoy going they have the best coffee and the staff is so friendly and nice
Love Brakeman's! Consistently great coffee, new pastries to try all the time,  perfect cozy atmosphere, and sweetest staff!  Brakeman's never fails to brighten my day :-)

This place is what a coffee shop should be.  Lot of seating in different spaces, Outdoor seating, unique menu, and friendly staff.  Most importantly, everyone was wearing a mask and it was very clean.  I come to this coffee shop anytime I am in Matthews.  It is my favorite in Charlotte!

I come here every morning before work, they have helped me create a pleasant morning routine after dropping my son off at school. The barista (baristo, perhaps?) Scott is often the one who makes my drinks, and he is friendly and engaging when you come to pick up your order. I highly recommend this coffee shop to those who are looking to study, meet up with friends, or would just like a quick treat.

LOVED the place! I had the Brakeman's House coffee... I've recently gone to drinking my coffee black and THIS blend was FANTASTIC! The indoor seating was quaint but we chose the outdoor area for the view and the gorgeous weather! Highly recommend!
Love, love, loved it there! Perfectly placed in downtown Matthews. Thank you for the yummy tea!
Lavender Latte was on point

Absolutely a great place to sit down and relax while drinking a coffee. I had a mocha and a muffin but i bet that the other stuff on the menu are fabulous too. I definitely recommend coming here if your and vacation, want a quick drink, or to relax and study. If i could give this place 10 stars i would. The baristas are really nice and helpful and know how to communicate properly. Their merch is also really cool to so if you want a gift for someone that likes coffee you found one. The place is really nice too and very well organized.

Not the greatest experience first time going. Ordered two drip coffees, had to wait 20 minutes. Gave me a large Latte instead of a small drip. Latte was disgusting, had a burnt almond taste. Drip coffee was average.  Nice atmosphere inside, lots of outdoor seating.  I would try going again when it's not so busy.
Good coffee
Great place to get a cup of coffee and do some work. Try the Lavender Latte!
Delightful atmosphere and fantastic coffee! Try the caramel oat milk latte!

Really cool coffee shop in Matthews. Matthews has never had a coffee shop like this so it's great to have them here. Coffee and drinks are great here. Staff is nice and their shop is very clean and has a lot of seating options inside and outside. They sell merchandise as well along with coffee to take home to brew yourself which is cool. Definitely recommend Brakeman.
Coffee 3 stars but I'd give the espresso pops 6 stars if I could. Very nice atmosphere too, looks like a smaller version of Amelie's.
Great coffee and nice people
Exellent
Great service
Stopped first time expecting great coffee from local coffee shop, disappointed with drip coffee very weak brew as well the latte.  Great location, ambiance must serve up best coffee.
Great coffee and such sweet people making it! I can see them smiling behind their masks!
Love the coffee with blueberries definitely ruined Starbucks for me
Lovely place, much more space than I expected. Wonderful backyard area. Super tasty Hibiscus ice tea. Definitely will come back.
Haven't been disappointed!
Best coffee place in town.  Beats Starbuck's every day of the week.
Ambience is lovely

Brakeman's is all around wonderful! It's the cutest little shop in the heart of Matthews. I drive about 30 minutes out of my way from Monroe to get coffee here. I typically try coffee shops for their dirty chai lattes and to support local. This place inspired me to try something new, their Lavender Latte is so delicious and my husband is obsessed with their Turmeric Ginger Chai. The staff are all friendly and truly accommodating. They are also doing a great job supporting their community during the current pandemic. I will be back as often as possible and highly recommend to anyone willing to listen.
Brakeman's is the best!!

Brakeman's is a breath of fresh air for downtown Matthews! We love our local coffee shop and are frequent flyers here. The coffee is amazing, the vibe is perfect, and people love meeting me here for meetings from all over Charlotte. Our kids love to come with us on the weekends to get a kids' hot chocolate and visit the kids' play area, too!
One of the best coffee shops around! Great service, consistently delicious drinks. I love how nothing is overly-sweet or Americanized -the ratios are perfect!
Good coffee and a nice patio.
Very good coffee and friendly staff. Hidden treasure ‚ù§

It's a good spot to hang or do your work/study. It's busy most of the times and may be hard to find a seat. When the weather's nice, it's good to sit outside (both front/back).  Everyone has different preferences with coffee. I think coffee here is around 3-4/5. I usually get a 10 oz. hot latte and I feel that the ratio or how they make it taste a bit inconsistent. I visited about 10+ times with almost same drink and sometimes it's good, sometimes it's too milky and don't get enough of the fresh coffee flavor.
Great atmosphere!

This place is soo cute! They have great coffee and great dairy free options, the baristas are amazing and so kind! They are very friendly and the place is really cute. They have a great place to sit outside and hang out or to do homework or any other kind of work.
Delicious lattes and one of the best scones I've ever eaten!
Delicious! Love the specialty drinks. And a great place to work on the computer or chat!
I stopped here after a Dr. appointment across the street. Great little shop for great coffee!
Love it!! Good coffee and treats!! Nice staff as well!
Adorable place. Met with a friend for coffee and found something usual on the menu and sat outside and conversed for hours.

Great coffee shop. There are several rooms and an upstairs with available seating. There is also a play area for kids and outdoor seating. Coffee is great- lots of different drinks to choose from. Highly recommended.

Love the atmosphereand the coffee is delicious, the people are super friendly and I love that its local. Only downside is that there is really limited seating if you want to study or read and just hang out there. And upstairs it's a little too stuffy for my comfort.
Great coffee!  Nice comfortable place to buy coffee from.  Owners are very welcoming and prompt.  Coffee is always fresh.  I highly recommend Brakeman's Coffee & Supply!
Great little place. Tasty coffee. Parking can be iffy sometimes, but there is a great public parking area next to the train tracks. A quick lil walk for a good cup of coffee.
nice little coffee shop
Great vibe. If you're looking for a local coffee place away from Starbucks this is the place.
First thing's first: great coffee and espresso drinks. Add in the friendly staff, awesome vibe, great location, easy parking and you have a hit.
Always a nice time. Good coffee. Great environment.
Great locally roasted coffee, good service, and a warm atmosphere.

Have been here several times, very unfortunately.  I am always disappointed with the drinks. The location is perfect and I still come here for that reason alone, but I really wish they changed their coffee beans and overall menu items.
Great service,atmosphere is very fun...and coffee

I tried the lavendar latte because it was recommended in reviews. It was a unique treat but much sweeter than I expected. Great environment and service, and it looked like there was parking in the back!
Love the quaintness of this coffee shop!
Coffee was good, wish there were more healthy snacks to go with.
Best Caramel Macchiato I've ever had! Get it iced!
Great coffee

I love this place. The staff is super-friendly and it's a really cozy setting. Very nice atmosphere. There are multiple rooms to sit in (including an upstairs). There's outside sitting in the front and back. The location is great too (downtown Matthews).
Great coffee and comfy atmosphere.
Great coffee, people, and atmosphere. Lots of nooks to laptop or tablet away in.
(Translated by Google) Nice and beautiful place  (Original) ŸÖŸÉÿßŸÜ ŸÑÿ∑ŸäŸÅ Ÿàÿ¨ŸÖŸäŸÑ
The best coffee in Matthews with an unhurried atmosphere to enjoy it in. You'll fall in love here!
This was my first time in. The baristas were super friendly and engaging. The atmosphere is everything I like in a coffee shop. I'll definitely be back.

I love the environment/atmosphere here with the patio and plenty of outdoor seating close by to the farmer's market. The coffee is that kitschy millennial style I don't really care for, yet it's still nice! Great place to catch up with friends or do some light reading and/or people watching.
Love everything about this quaint coffee shop!

Such a cozy place, there's so many areas to sit down and get lost in whatever you're doing. I love going upstairs where it's nice and quiet. The staff is always extremely nice and conversational, the coffee is even better!
Excellent local spot. Good coffee and great space to get work done.
Great place and excellent coffee!

Brakeman's is the Goto coffee spot in Matthews. Unfortunately, that means it's always packed and hard to find a table for even one guest, let alone a larger group.  The staff is friendly, the prices are just right, and the selection is exactly what you'd expect from a family coffee shop.
Great Service, Great atmosphere, great coffee!!

First visit was for baked goods for my employees.  They were friendly, helpful, and chatted with customers while making their drinks.  Delicious product and groovy hangout atmosphere with wifi in a beautiful, old house with a private patio out back.   A must-visit in Matthews.

Have been in Charlotte for a week on business and searched for different local coffee shops to get my favorite americano. This is the place I kept coming back to, they are amazing and the coffee is just high quality. I also ended up buying a tumbler coffee mug to take back home to Seattle !  Thank you for amazing coffee and service !
Cute, quiet coffee shop in Downtown Matthews. Their drinks are delicious and I love the atmosphere.
Great local shop!
Great coffee and AMAZING baristas üëå
Good Local Coffee Place. Friendly service, very good coffee and nice selection of baked goods. Fun Street facing patio.
Excellent service
Nice and friendly atmosphere. Like the ability to move from room to room inside or go outside. Coffee is excellent.
Adorable local coffee shop with great lattes and the serve some food and snacks as well.
Love, love, loved it! I tried the Rosemary lavender seasonal coffee..mmm..
Tasty coffee and nice atmosphere
Very friendly staff, my macchiato with perfect, I will be back
Great coffee in the heart of Matthews,NC
Friendly staff and lots of seating! Including upstairs.
Great local coffeehouse!
Really great vibe. Friendly employees
Excellent service. Friendly staff. Great place to grab a coffee and wind down. Always busy but never an issue.
L-o-v-e this place
I believe this coffee bar to be one of the best in Charlotte.
Great cozy atmosphere with great coffee and baked goods.  Always friendly staff, such a good addition to downtown Matthews.
Been here a couple of times. Last time ordered a Foo Foo coffee hot and it came to me luke warm.
Very good coffee, good internet and atmosphere for sitting & reading, small meeting
Great place for coffee lovers!

Much better experience than the visit my last review was based.  Coffee is really good and this is a nice place to sit down and spend some time in conversation and sipping some joe.  I see several folks sitting trying to work but I noticed this shop is t the typical quiet coffee shop.  It's not loud but personally, I'd have a hard time focusing.
Friendly, patient staff. The space rambles on so you're almost guaranteed to find a spot perfect for you. Great neighborhood treasure.
I really enjoyed my experience here, my chai latte was great and the bartenders were very very nice. I love coming in here

I go to coffee shops to get chai tea lattes and I wasn't disappointed, I got my extra pump of vanilla for my sweet tooth. This coffee shop has a very chill atmosphere, modern farm house decor, outdoor seating in the front and the back of the store. 5 different indoor seating areas!!!! For those of us who work from home and want to switch up the scenery the place is accommodating to wifi workers. I definitely recommend visiting this coffee shop!üíôüòä They also have some treats, vegan options, regular beverages, and kombuchaüçûüç™ü•õ‚òïüçÆ
Great place for coffee and doing work!

1,000 stars and more! I loved the vibes, super chill and cozy. The vegan options made my day and were delicious! For an out of towner my experience was wonderful. Madi was great!! 10/10 would recommend going here and wish I could have stayed to just sit and read a book outside.

Baristas need training to be able to be more versed in the art of making coffee. Great location, great building, great town of Matthews. Just need more upper level management with a knowledge of coffee making to assist the newer baristas. 2 out of 3 of our drinks ($20) were fair at best. I want this place to be good but there is room for improvement
I love the atmosphere
Great coffee. Nice place to Hangout.
Always one of the best cups of coffee I have.
So great
Nice mom and pop for breakfast
Great coffee, perfect location.
Great espresso and coffee bar. Cherry cheese muffins and Blueberry Scones.
Great atmosphere and good coffee

Definitely for the yuppie crowd, a bunch of hipsters were chilling and hanging loose with their laptops all around with earbuds in (a lot of cool folks with the fancy airpods).  The smoothie I got was good
Great coffee. Great people. Great community. Brakeman's is a wonderful part of the Matthews community!
..Espresso was extremely bitter & chai overly sweet. Prices reflect this
Best coffee on Matthews

Sometimes I feel like I'm not hipster enough to drink coffee there. But that is just the trend these days. The owners are pretty amazing people and the employees are very kind. The atmosphere is nice and warm. Overall a great place for a meeting or to get some studying done.
Nice place to treat the grandkids.
Cozy coffee bar - good for families with young kids
Wonderful coffee house!
Good coffee, unique setting in an old house.
What an awesome addition to our great little town. This place is love at first site for any one who walks in the door.
Quiet and Fun location for great coffee and a good book to read.
Beautiful patio
This coffee shop is amazing. Really cool atmosphere and the stuff couldn't be better! Got a seasonal special their Snickerdoozle and it was SO GOOD! Local business done right!

The location is an excellent place to meet and hang out. 3 of us sat out front watching Matthews happen this past weekend. The interior space is trendy with several seating options. The coffee was Meh... No specialty drinks for the most part, No pour overs, No french press... They have cold brew though, I guess it's their thing... It was light. The service was sooooo slow, lucky I didn't have anywhere to be.  I'd definitely go back as it's a nice place to chill and people watch, just wouldn't have high hopes for a great coffee.  PS... They don't open Sundays.
I love this place, specialy when I see Elavation Church people!!!

Great little coffee shop in a cute old house. Snickerdoodle latte was just perfect. Staff were friendly and helpful. I especially loved the theme of the daily wi-fi password. We should all Slow Down a little more in our busy lives. üôÇ
Great atmosphere,  nice outdoor seating out back! Good coffee and tea, lovely pastries.
Friendly staff, good coffee, nice sitting area outside in a  little garden at the back

A really phenomenal place. The coffee and espresso been amazing every time I've gone in and I love that they carry Whisk & Wood. It can be hard to find a place to sit but I'm not too bothered because it means they're doing well, and they deserve the business! The sun room in the front is my favorite spot.

I got their lavender latte and it was the best latte I have ever had. Unique flavors, friendly staff, and great atmosphere! Definitely a must to visit when you are in the area. I know I'll be there when I'm in town.
I love the environment and the coffee!!
Such a fun spot to grab a cup of coffee or smoothie. Nice area for kids to play, charming building with local art. One of the best small businesses in town!

Came in for a quick caffeine pick-me-up one afternoon when wandering through downtown Matthews after grabbing some beers nearby.  I had been wanting to check this place out for awhile since I'd seen it because it looked so cute, and quaint, and like it would be make a nice cuppa joe.  Alas! I came in and it was pretty busy, waited in the long line, and the staff was really nice, making jokes and greeting people warmly as they walked up to order and calling out the drinks that were ready.  I ordered a simple espresso as I figured a place like this would make a great one. Sadly, that was not my experience. My espresso was way too acidic to the point of being almost undrinkable and it was a little burnt. Not sure if they were just having an off day or if I got some leftover espresso from a previous order or what the deal was, but for the price and atmo and other reviews, I expected so much better and was so disappointed!  Needless to say, I don't see myself coming back, at least not for awhile to get both the figurative & literal "bad taste out of my mouth".  1-star for the coffee but 4 stars for the service and decor. However, being the coffee junkie that I am, I should never like a coffee place's service & decor way better than their actual coffee (insert sad face here)
Nice meeting place
Favorite coffee shop in Charlotte. Great variety of quality coffees, and a great environment. I've never had so many great conversations in a coffee shop.
Great environment, upbeat customer service and excellent coffee. The prices are very reasonable. Would definitely recommend.
Awesome atmosphere but the coffee they use is very unique and I am not a fan. I still go there though for the atmosphere.

I was just there for the first time.  Nice place to visit and meet with friends and business associates. The place was packed by mid morning on a Monday.  However, I did not like the coffee. I drink my coffee black so I am tasting the coffee in it's true form and I could not even finish it.  They need to look into a different brand in my opinion.  If I ever go again i will bring my own coffee.

This is one of my favorite spots in Matthews right now. I may be partially biased by a good date or two. But the coffee is great and it has a fantastic atmosphere. Although it is often busy you can usually find a corner somewhere to enjoy your coffee and good conversation with someone or if you are by yourself working it is also good for that as well!

Pretty good coffee, I really enjoyed the feel of the shop. I do wish there was more space, but I recognize that it is in downtown Matthews, therefore smaller building. I also wish there was more parking.
Great place to stop and have coffee
Drip coffee was solid. Also this spot is really nice to sit inside. If you're in the area, stop by for sure.
The best coffee shop in the area!
Good coffee drinks and lots of nooks and crannies you can hide in for a few hours
Excellent chia and great vibe... definitely a place to go and enjoy a cup of joe while you catch-up on emails
Service, atmosphere, and coffee are excellent!
